comments: Contract awarded by PWGSC. This contract was competitively sourced. Original contract value of $1,695,000.00 was modified for a revised value of $5,650,000.00. This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 20140223A dated 2014.01.15 to 2015.03.31. The contract was misstated for award date of 2014.01.15 and contract period 2014.01.15 to 2014.03.31 and has been corrected.
